function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Optimization of resource consumption in urban areas through big data and computational technologies","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prolonged existence of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Second/third wave of the pandemic in cities","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical reference to the spanish flu pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation in urban areas","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial subsidies may lead to an increase in the production and distribution of iot devices, potentially increasing the risk of disease transmission through contaminated devices.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of new technologies such as 6g, iot, and immersive xr may lead to an expansion of cashless economies, potentially influencing the spread of contagious diseases through the handling of cashless payments.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The increased reliance on online schooling and work-at-home programs may result in prolonged close contact among individuals, leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in these settings.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical and moral issues related to 6g technology","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 infected persons","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on video conferencing technologies for communications","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drones and robots for delivering medical supplies","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased data sharing due to technological frameworks like 6g","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in data generation from various technologies like ai, crowd computing, ar, and 5g","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital inequality in cities","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to crowded urban built environments","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities due to the pandemic","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economic impact and recession due to the pandemic","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in urban environments","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and consideration of pandemics in urban planning and architectural professional institutions.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mosquito-infested swamplands in post-wwi and spanish flu eras","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disease-infested environments in densely populated urban areas","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread virus spread despite quarantine and lockdown measures.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to global travel and trade","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases such as zika, h1n1, and covid-19 leading to social and political tensions","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide compensation to affected businesses during health crises","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extreme measures taken by citizens to prevent the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of planning and management leading to ostracism, racism, and social conflict","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding of basic commodities and spreading fear","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Severe economic losses and decline in tourism due to pandemic measures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emergency preparedness in urban areas","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of non-medical spaces into medical facilities during outbreaks","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelmed medical facilities during outbreaks","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of outbreaks on urban functionality","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large-scale spread of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacy of medical staff and resources in severe areas","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of public management in pandemic control","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex social systems leading to lower stability and restrictions on public health measures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict public management and restricted daily life","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to screen suspected infectors due to large-scale and fast-moving population","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of workers to implement lockdown policy due to home quarantine","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misappropriation of medical materials due to lack of supervision and monitoring","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deployment of 5g-based robots and unmanned vehicles for medical care and delivery may reduce the need for human presence, materials","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Massive and diverse 5g-based robot systems in hospitals","category":"Capacity movement causing infection","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Theoretical model of how 5g enables covid-19 prevention and
